document_data.name: ''Thunder Mace''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Thunder mace''''' was an enchanted bludgeon that often was accompanied by a [[shield]] from [[Waterdeep]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Thunder mace'', along with its sister shield, appeared to be crafted out of [[gold]] or golden-colored metal.
document_data.Powers: Aptly named, ''thunder mace'' was imbued with ''thunder'' magic, allowing the wielder to deal additional electric damage to a target. Upon a successful strike, ''thunder mace'' could gain a temporary damage boots.
